title: Freezing My computer
body: Ever since the patch and the update on my computer league will freeze either as we are loading the game screen or at the second I get in the game. PLS HElp this happens every time i try to play. I reinstalled league and overwolf.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be running Windows 10 and recently installed the Anniversary update. This update enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature inside the game bar. I recommend [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.
I had the exact same issue, but after following your advice and disabling the game bar im happy to say that league is running very smoothly so far. thank you very much for the help :)
